commit 93255c39bbecd61fdbd1aeb515c352a656a6f071
Author: Armin Ronacher <armin.ronacher@active-4.com>
Date:   Mon Aug 21 16:40:00 2017 -0700

    Improved example-project dumps to use headless chrome

diff --git a/tests/sentry/lang/javascript/example-project/index.html b/tests/sentry/lang/javascript/example-project/index.html
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000..32f802f4bc
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/sentry/lang/javascript/example-project/index.html
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+<!doctype html>
+<script type=text/javascript src=test.min.js></script>
+<script>
+  function produceStack() {
+    try {
+      makeAFailure();
+    } catch (e) {
+      return e.stack;
+    }
+  }
+</script>
diff --git a/tests/sentry/lang/javascript/example-project/launch.js b/tests/sentry/lang/javascript/example-project/launch.js
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000..389b2dde03
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/sentry/lang/javascript/example-project/launch.js
@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@
+const fs = require('fs');
+const puppeteer = require('puppeteer');
+const stacktraceParser = require('stacktrace-parser');
+
+function convertStack(frames) {
+  return frames.map((item) => {
+    var match = item.file.match(/^.*\/(.*?)$/);
+    var fileName, absPath;
+    if (match && match[1]) {
+      fileName = match[1];
+      absPath = 'http://example.com/' + fileName;
+    } else {
+      fileName = absPath = item.file;
+    }
+    return {
+      abs_path: absPath,
+      filename: fileName,
+      lineno: item.lineNumber,
+      colno: item.column,
+      'function': item.methodName,
+    };
+  });
+}
+
+(async() => {
+  const browser = await puppeteer.launch();
+  const page = await browser.newPage();
+  await page.goto('file://' + __dirname + '/index.html');
+  const stack = await page.evaluate('produceStack()');
+  const frames = convertStack(stacktraceParser.parse(stack));
+  frames.pop();
+  const stackDump = JSON.stringify(frames, null, 2) + '\n';
+  fs.writeFile('minifiedError.json', stackDump, function() {
+    browser.close();
+  });
+})();

+  },

+    "filename": "index.html",
+    "lineno": 6,
+    "colno": 7,
+    "function": "produceStack"
   }
 ]

diff --git a/tests/sentry/lang/javascript/example-project/test.js b/tests/sentry/lang/javascript/example-project/test.js

@@ -1,22 +1,24 @@
-function onSuccess(data) {}
+var makeAFailure = (function() {
+  function onSuccess(data) {}
 
-function onFailure(data) {
-  throw new Error('failed!');
-}
+  function onFailure(data) {
+    throw new Error('failed!');
+  }
 
-function invoke(data) {
-  var cb = null;
-  if (data.failed) {
-    cb = onFailure;
-  } else {
-    cb = onSuccess;
+  function invoke(data) {
+    var cb = null;
+    if (data.failed) {
+      cb = onFailure;
+    } else {
+      cb = onSuccess;
+    }
+    cb(data);
   }
-  cb(data);
-}
 
-function test() {
-  var data = {failed: true, value: 42};
-  invoke(data);
-}
+  function test() {
+    var data = {failed: true, value: 42};
+    invoke(data);
+  }
 
-module.exports = test;
+  return test;
+})();

+{"version":3,"file":"test.min.js","sources":["test.js"],"names":["makeAFailure","onSuccess","data","onFailure","Error","invoke","cb","failed","test","value"],"mappings":"AAAA,GAAIA,cAAe,WACjB,QAASC,GAAUC,IAEnB,QAASC,GAAUD,GACjB,KAAM,IAAIE,OAAM,WAGlB,QAASC,GAAOH,GACd,GAAII,GAAK,IACT,IAAIJ,EAAKK,OAAQ,CACfD,EAAKH,MACA,CACLG,EAAKL,EAEPK,EAAGJ,GAGL,QAASM,KACP,GAAIN,IAAQK,OAAQ,KAAME,MAAO,GACjCJ,GAAOH,GAGT,MAAOM","sourcesContent":["var makeAFailure = (function() {\n  function onSuccess(data) {}\n\n  function onFailure(data) {\n    throw new Error('failed!');\n  }\n\n  function invoke(data) {\n    var cb = null;\n    if (data.failed) {\n      cb = onFailure;\n    } else {\n      cb = onSuccess;\n    }\n    cb(data);\n  }\n\n  function test() {\n    var data = {failed: true, value: 42};\n    invoke(data);\n  }\n\n  return test;\n})();\n"]}

diff --git a/tests/sentry/lang/javascript/example-project/triggerError.js b/tests/sentry/lang/javascript/example-project/triggerError.js
deleted file mode 100644
index 570da9c433..0000000000
--- a/tests/sentry/lang/javascript/example-project/triggerError.js
+++ /dev/null
@@ -1,37 +0,0 @@
-var fs = require('fs');
-var StackTrace = require('stacktrace-js');
-var normalError = require('./test.js');
-var minifiedError = require('./test.min.js');
-
-function dumpSentryStacktrace(frames) {
-  var newFrames = [];
-
-  frames.forEach(function(frame) {
-    var match = frame.fileName.match(/^.*\/(test(\.min)?\.js)$/);
-    if (!match) {
-      return;
-    }
-    newFrames.push({
-      abs_path: 'http://example.com/static/' + match[1],
-      filename: match[1],
-      function: frame.functionName,
-      lineno: frame.lineNumber,
-      colno: frame.columnNumber
-    });
-  });
-
-  return JSON.stringify(newFrames, null, 2) + '\n';
-}
-
-function triggerError(func, fn) {
-  try {
-    func();
-  } catch (e) {
-    StackTrace.fromError(e).then(function(stack) {
-      fs.writeFile(fn, dumpSentryStacktrace(stack), function() {});
-    });
-  }
-}
-
-triggerError(normalError, 'normalError.json');
-triggerError(minifiedError, 'minifiedError.json');
